amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for programs at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security Cooperation located at Fort Benning, Georgia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for programs at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security Cooperation located at Fort Benning, Georgia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 214, 1 Present (Roll no. 536).
